name: SteelPunk (Lisab, Nic0InTheRadio, vshinori)
description:
Play as an Elite Steam Soldier on a mission to track his predecessor ! 

Beat up the ennemies on your way in a first person game and explore a steampunk city. 

---

After waking up in a lab without any memories, you are ordered to track down your predecessor.

This mission is now possible thanks to your new arms equipped with the “SteelPunk” technology. This technology unlocks brand new abilities that turn you into a literal killing machine.

Controls Keyboard
  • ZQSD : moving
  • Space bar : jumping
  • Mouse : camera
  • Left Click : left hand attack
  • Right Click : right hand attack
  • Hold Left / Right Click : heavy strike
  • F : Shotgun
  • Shift : Dash
  • Ctrl : Block
  • P : pause / unpause
Controller Chaise Breakers:
